      • matrixMultiply

        public static float[][] matrixMultiply(float[][] mat1,
                                       float[][] mat2)
        Multiply 2 matrices, given their dimensions allow them to be multiplied together
        Parameters:
        mat1 - left hand AxB matrix
        mat2 - right hand BxC matrix
        Returns:
        AxC matrix

      • modMat

        public static float[][] modMat(float[][] mat,
                               float mod)
        Modulos each value in the matrix by the given value
        Parameters:
        mat - matrix to be operated on
        mod - modulo value
        Returns:
        matrix moduloed by the given value

      • extModMat

        public static float[][] extModMat(float[][] mat,
                                  float mod)
        After a modulo, makes all values the positive modulo. When using a modulo on a float value, a negative number can be returned
        Parameters:
        mat - matrix to be operated on
        mod - mod value
        Returns:
        matrix with all positive mod values

      • modInv

        public static int modInv(int co,
                         int mod)
        Gets modular inverse of a value. For text, the modulo value should be 97
        Parameters:
        co - value to find modular inverse of with given modulo
        mod - modulo
        Returns:
        modular inverse of co (mod mod)
